channel.title: Moderated?
channel.description: I'm sorry lawl. I thought moderated meant like.. you staff member moderators :P. And that you jokingly gave me powers :P. I have now realised that I am under post moderation? And request IRC ban redemption and de-moderation :P? [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] I agree with Daviddude.[/center]

item.title: Moderated?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:4, topic:213421”][quote author=Andrewsouls link=topic=280935.msg2283374#msg2283374 date=1213799185]
I’m sorry lawl.
I thought moderated meant like… you staff member moderators :P.
And that you jokingly gave me powers :P.
I have now realised that I am under post moderation? And request IRC ban redemption and de-moderation :P?
[/quote]
You deserve more than a moderation in my opinion.[/quote]
Hear hear.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderated?
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:213436”][quote author=ada link=topic=280935.msg2283447#msg2283447 date=1213805285]

I’m sorry lawl.
I thought moderated meant like… you staff member moderators :P.
And that you jokingly gave me powers :P.
I have now realised that I am under post moderation? And request IRC ban redemption and de-moderation :P?

You deserve more than a moderation in my opinion.

Administration? lol
[/quote]
Do you even know what the word “moderation” means…?[/quote]

Yes, I do. It was merely a joke, seeing as davidude36 said he deserves more than moderation. SO I simply put administration for the fun of it…

Read full topic
